revised_title: Construction of Displacement Fields in Dislocation Loops and Stacking-Fault Tetrahedra
tldr: The authors present a versatile method for constructing displacement fields of dislocation loops and stacking-fault tetrahedra using angular dislocation segments. This technique allows for the creation of various shapes of dislocation loops and complex defects, improving the efficiency of computer simulations and providing more accurate results for analyzing defect clusters in materials.
